news.title: Google was at risk of losing its dominance — until it promoted this AI executive
news.summary: Josh Woodward, a 16-year Google veteran, is tasked with running the Gemini app and going head-to-head with OpenAI in the booming generative AI market.

news.title: Epstein files released by DOJ
news.summary: President Donald Trump signed the Epstein Files Transparency Act in November. The act is aimed at transparency in the sex scandal involving billionaire financier Jeffrey Epstein.

news.title: Nine of the largest pharma companies ink deals with Trump to lower drug prices
news.summary: President Donald Trump has pushed to lower drug prices for Americans. Drug prices in the U.S. are on average nearly three times higher than overseas.

news.title: How Build-A-Bear went from a penny stock to a retail winner
news.summary: Under CEO Sharon Price John, the company has undergone a significant turnaround. Build-A-Bear Workshop's business plummeted during the pandemic.

news.title: NY Fed President Williams says some 'technical factors' distorted November's CPI reading downward
news.summary: "Technical factors" likely distorted November's inflation data, Williams says. That pushed the headline reading lower than it otherwise would have been, he says.

news.title: Adobe and these 9 fellow tech stocks are rarely this cheap. Are they great deals or value traps?
news.summary: The AI threat has led storied software stocks like Salesforce and Adobe to trade near their cheapest levels in years. Analysts are divided on which names will re-emerge as winners.

news.title: In 2024, prediction markets called the presidential election before the polls could. Now, they’re mostly betting on sports.
news.summary: Prediction markets saw exponential growth in 2025, according to a new report. The prediction market is set to grow even faster in the future, the report says.

news.title: My husband and I are splitting our estate between his child and my three children. Should they get equal shares?
news.summary: “We try to help all our kids when we can, yet push for self-sufficiency,” she says. “We’re trying to help them as much as we can.”

news.title: Rocket Lab’s stock blasts to a new high. Here’s what’s driving the surge.
news.summary: The rocket-launch company just completed a government contract months ahead of schedule — and won a new one. The contract is with the U.S. Department of Defense.

news.title: As stock-market rally broadens, it’s tough for the S&P 500 to keep advancing without tech
news.summary: The S&P 500’s tech sector is down so far this month, even after its big rally on Friday. The tech sector has been the worst-performing sector in the S&P 500 this year.
